content.rendered:
Flaym is a set of 5 stylish and modern Brand Book and Style Guide presentation templates. Each template includes different page layouts to provide optimal flexibility for your project.

Design your presentation in the same programs you’re designing your brand with Illustrator and Sketch compatible files.

Flaym template includes six PSD mockups and four vector based mockups you can use to show off your work.

Present your brand in a creative and stylish way! Perfect for the modern brand presentation or style guide.

5 Templates + 75+ Unique Pages + 10 Easy to Edit Mockups + Sketch Compatible + Illustrator Compatible
